 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med tillträde enligt överenskommelse. Tjänsten innebär resor med din servicebil med hemmet som utgångspunkt, B-körkort är ett krav. Resor och övernattningar förekommer i tjänsten och vid behov kan du behöva arbeta på kringliggande distrikt.
   

  

 Har du frågor gällande tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Torbjörn Svensson, tel: 070 602 3016.
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan senast den 16 mars 2025!**
**Om DeLaval**
 Vår vision är att möjliggöra hållbar livsmedelsproduktion. Som ett företag som bygger på innovation arbetar vi ständigt med att hitta sätt att hjälpa våra kunder, mjölkproducenter, att göra mer med mindre genom att tillhandahålla världsledande mjölkningsutrustning och lösningar.
   

  

 Idag har DeLaval cirka 4500 passionerade yrkesverksamma som verkar på mer än 100 marknader runt om i världen. DeLaval är en del av Tetra Laval-gruppen. Välkommen att läsa mer på www.delavalcorporate.com

title: LIA 2 Internship in Malmö - Analytics / Data Qu...
description:
**Location:** Malmö  

**Start date:** Autumn 2025  

**Positions to fill:** 1

**About Conversionista**
------------------------


Conversionista is Scandinavia's largest team of conversion optimization specialists. We use data-driven insights and scientific methods to help renowned companies enhance their digital platforms and enable businesses to flourish. Our teams are dedicated to improving user experiences and achieving business growth through actionable insights.

**Internship overview**
-----------------------


We are excited to offer this internship position in our Malmö office. We are looking for an enthusiastic, talented, and motivated intern who wants to learn and progress in one or several of the following areas:

* Web Analytics / Data Analytics / Digital Analytics
* Data Quality / Tracking Implementation


As an intern at Conversionista, you will collaborate with our expert consultants and work directly with established, well-known companies. This hands-on experience will allow you to apply your theoretical knowledge to real-world challenges, bridging the gap between academia and industry.

**What you will do**
--------------------

* Assist in the collection and analysis of qualitative and quantitative data.
* Engage in the optimization processes to improve overall conversion rates.
* Participate in the development and implementation of tracking systems.
* Work alongside senior team members on client projects.

Help make data easily accessible and understandable, enabling crucial business.  
* 

**What we offer**
-----------------

* A learning-centric environment where you will grow as an analyst.
* Exposure to exciting brands and impactful projects.
* A supportive and caring organizational culture, with helpful colleagues across our various teams and competencies (CRO, UX, User Research, Analytics, Data Quality, Advisory).
* A dedicated mentor to guide you throughout your internship and provide skill development coaching.

An opportunity to learn about and contribute to data-driven design and CRO practices.  
* 

**Who you are**
---------------

* Currently in your final year or recently graduated from a relevant program such as Digital Analytics, Business Analytics, or Data Science.
* Passionate about topics like data analysis, digital optimization, and tracking implementation.
* Has some experience with web analytics tools such as Google Analytics 4 and Google Tag Manager.
* Eager to learn and apply data-driven approaches in identifying and solving customer pain points that will eventually impact the business.
* Excellent communication skills and a professional demeanor.

**Application process**
-----------------------


To apply, please submit your resume along with a cover letter via this portal, explaining why you are applying to Conversionista, what you are most interested in, and how your skills align with those interests.


This position is based in our Malmö office. While we offer the flexibility of working remotely, we encourage working mostly on-site to ensure you get the most out of your internship!

**Note that we can’t process any applications through email or LinkedIn. All applications must be submitted through this portal.**


  
Department
Expert Consulting
Role
Internship (LIA)
Locations
Malmö
Remote status
Hybrid
  
Contact Hanna Nilsson Senior Analytics Specialist – Expert Consulting

title: Web Editor and Content Creator (temporary employment)
description:
**Om tjänsten**
---------------

  

How does building a new business for Vattenfall sound? Are you an experienced communicator and an expert in creating state of the art content? Are you a digital native who works data driven and always puts the customer first? If yes, the Vattenfall DES Nordic team – responsible for Vattenfall's solar, battery, and flexibility services – can offer an interesting opportunity to work with products and solutions that make a difference.

**About the role**


As Web Editor and Content Creator within the Nordic DES team, you will support the solar and battery business in business development projects and daily operational work.

* **Web Editor:** You will produce, analyze and improve content on the website, keeping SEO, CRO and potential A/B-tests in mind.
* **Content Creator:** You will help the daily, operational business with copywriting and design, creating and updating assets such as sales folders, order forms and confirmations, emails, newsletters and surveys.
* **Communicator:** You will assist in business development initiatives, creating customer-centric communication, appealing offers and comprehensible information based on business strategy and customer and market insights.

**As a person you need capabilities such as:**

* Creativity paired with attention to detail. You understand the possibilities and boundaries in brand guidelines.
* Capacity to work in a fast speeded and changing business area where priorities and tasks may change rapidly.
* Being structured and capable to work independently.
* A ‘’get things done’’-mentality, i.e. a pragmatic approach, an ability to think out of the box and deliver in time.
* Curiosity and the courage to suggest and argue for your own ideas and standpoints.
* Having a true team spirit.

**Din bakgrund**
----------------

  

* Fluent in Swedish and English verbally and in writing. Finnish is meritorious.
* Academic degree within preferably digital communication or marketing and/or minimum 3 years relevant working experience
* Experience and proven track record as a communicator and/or web editor
* Understanding of SEO and accessibility guidelines
* Experience from working with:
* CMS and CRM systems (we use Episerver and Microsoft Dynamics)
* Adobe Creative Suite
* Web analysis tools such as Piwik Pro, Google Analytics, Matomo or similar
* SEO tools such as Ahrefs or similar

**Meritorious:**

* Previous work in the solar business or within a technical field
* Previous work in a large, complex organization
* Experience from agile way of working
* Customer surveys – planning, effectuation and analysis of results
* Experience/interest in UX design
* Experience in working with email marketing
* Marketing automation knowledge

**Mer information**
-------------------

 **Our Offer**  

We offer a challenging and international work environment and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field. You will be working in interdisciplinary teams and you can always count on support from committed colleagues as ‘Ask and Share’ concept is essential for the way we work. We offer attractive employment conditions (smart working, flexible working hours and a good-work-life balance) and opportunities for personal and professional development. Click here for further information.

**Position**: Temporary 8 month employment

**Location**: Solna, Sweden. 40 % work place flexibility, 60 % office presence required.

title: Teknisk skribent
description:
Vill du jobba med kommunikation och teknik i framkant, samtidigt som du bidrar till samhällsnyttan? Hos oss får du intressanta arbetsuppgifter i samhällets hjärta, kombinerat med utvecklingsmöjligheter och balans mellan arbete och fritid. Var med och gör samhället möjligt!

**Om jobbet**  

Du kommer arbeta i ett tvärfunktionellt team som ansvarar för det digitala kundmötet där externa användare vill använda Skatteverkets öppna data och externa API:er.


Teamets huvudfokus är segmentet API:er och öppna data på skatteverket.se, Utvecklarportalen och API-console. Den här tjänsten avser att vara en del av teamet och främst bidra med kompetens som teknisk skribent. Övriga kompetenser i teamet är webbredaktör och kommunikatör, utvecklare och UX.


I rollen som teknisk skribent behöver du kunna sätta dig in i komplicerad teknisk information och presentera denna på ett pedagogiskt och lättillgängligt sätt för olika målgrupper. Dina arbetsuppgifter innefattar att ta fram guider och artiklar för externt bruk, framförallt rörande området API:er och öppna data. Det kan till exempel vara guider för utvecklare som ska integrera mot Skatteverkets API:er eller mer inspirerande artiklar för beslutsfattare på olika företag. Du förväntas också se till att befintligt material hålls uppdaterat, du bearbetar och publicerar API-beskrivningar, tar fram UX-copy till e-tjänster men också pressmeddelanden och nyhetsartiklar, och du stöttar internt med guider och manualer för olika typer av tjänster eller arbetsprocesser.


Arbetet sker i nära samarbete med webbredaktör och UX-designer, och kräver också kontakt med till exempel utvecklare, arkitekter, produktägare eller andra med relevant expertkunskap. Du förväntas även stötta andra inom kommunikationsområdet t.ex. utvecklare när de själva tar fram olika guider för internt bruk.


Verktyg du arbetar med är bland annat Jira, Confluence, Sitevison och Anypoint.


Vi jobbar aktivt med kompetens- och teknikutveckling och hos oss får du möjlighet till ständig utveckling och lärande i arbetet. Du har kunniga kollegor som du utbyter erfarenheter med och du kan utveckla både bredd och spets hos oss. Tack vare att vi är en stor it-organisation kan vi erbjuda goda möjligheter till intern rörlighet. Det är viktigt för oss att du har balans mellan jobb och fritid och vi erbjuder bland annat flexibel arbetstid och möjlighet att jobba delvis hemifrån. Du får en friskvårdstimme i veckan och friskvårdsbidrag.


Här kan du läsa mer om hur det är att jobba med it hos oss och ta del av vad några av våra medarbetare berättar om sina jobb: Jobba med it hos oss


Du tillhör it-avdelningen med placering i Sundbyberg.

**Om dig**  

För att göra ett bra jobb och trivas hos oss på Skatteverket behöver du vara lyhörd, tänka nytt och ta ansvar. I arbetet är gott omdöme och förståelse för rättssäkerhet och säkerhet viktigt. Du ska också leva upp till vår medarbetarpolicy.


I det här jobbet ska du:

* vara noggrann och strukturerad
* ha en god samarbetsförmåga och förmåga att jobba i team
* vara självgående, ta egna initiativ och agera proaktivt i syfte att målet med verksamheten uppnås
* uttrycka dig väl i tal och skrift på svenska enligt principerna för klarspråk.


 Du ska även ha:

* slutförd flerårig eftergymnasial utbildning inom data- och/eller systemvetenskap
* slutförd flerårig utbildning i journalistik eller kommunikation
* minst fem års arbetslivserfarenhet som teknisk skribent
* aktuell arbetslivserfarenhet av utvecklingsarbete i ett team med agilt arbetssätt
* kompetens inom UX.


Det är önskvärt om du har erfarenhet av det agila ramverket Safe, erfarenhet av arbete vid en myndighet samt från arbete med stora webbplatser.

**Bra att veta**  

Anställningen är tillsvidare och kan inledas med provanställning i sex månader.


En anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i säkerhetsklass. En säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan därför komma att genomföras före beslut om anställning. För en del av våra arbetsuppgifter i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.


På skatteverket.se/jobb kan du exempelvis läsa om vår samhällsbärande roll, fördelarna med att jobba hos oss och hur det går till när du söker våra jobb.


När du ansöker bifogar du ditt cv. Vi använder inte personligt brev i våra rekryteringar och du ska därför inte bifoga det i din ansökan.


Välkommen med din ansökan!


Skatteverket har en samhällsbärande roll. Vårt arbete berör alla privatpersoner och företag och genom vårt uppdrag bidrar vi till ett väl fungerande samhälle. Vår utveckling är kunddriven och vi samverkar med andra för att skapa effektiva lösningar. Tillsammans gör vi samhället möjligt.


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Sundbyberg | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/142 | Kontakt: Anna Skytt, sektionschef 010-5724135, Bo Söderkvist, hr-specialist rekrytering 010-5749369, | Facklig företrädare: Jeanette Forsgren, ST jeanette.forsgren@skatteverket.se, Göran Sundwall, Saco goran.sundwall@skatteverket.se, Therese Sjödin, Seko 010-5741405, | Publicerat: 2025-03-14 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-03-20

title: Web Editor and Content Creator (temporary employment)
description:
**Company Description**  

Vattenfall is one of Europe’s largest producers and retailers of electricity and heat. Our main markets are Sweden, Germany, the Netherlands, Denmark, and the UK. The Vattenfall Group has approximately 21 000 employees. We have been electrifying industries, powering homes and transforming life through innovation for more than 100 years.

 **Job Description**  

How does building a new business for Vattenfall sound? Are you an experienced communicator and an expert in creating state of the art content? Are you a digital native who works data driven and always puts the customer first? If yes, the Vattenfall DES Nordic team – responsible for Vattenfall's solar, battery, and flexibility services – can offer an interesting opportunity to work with products and solutions that make a difference.

**About the role**


As Web Editor and Content Creator within the Nordic DES team, you will support the solar and battery business in business development projects and daily operational work.

* **Web Editor:** You will produce, analyze and improve content on the website, keeping SEO, CRO and potential A/B-tests in mind.
* **Content Creator:** You will help the daily, operational business with copywriting and design, creating and updating assets such as sales folders, order forms and confirmations, emails, newsletters and surveys.
* **Communicator:** You will assist in business development initiatives, creating customer-centric communication, appealing offers and comprehensible information based on business strategy and customer and market insights.

**As a person you need capabilities such as:**

* Creativity paired with attention to detail. You understand the possibilities and boundaries in brand guidelines.
* Capacity to work in a fast speeded and changing business area where priorities and tasks may change rapidly.
* Being structured and capable to work independently.
* A ‘’get things done’’-mentality, i.e. a pragmatic approach, an ability to think out of the box and deliver in time.
* Curiosity and the courage to suggest and argue for your own ideas and standpoints.
* Having a true team spirit.

  

**Qualifications**  

* Fluent in Swedish and English verbally and in writing. Finnish is meritorious.
* Academic degree within preferably digital communication or marketing and/or minimum 3 years relevant working experience
* Experience and proven track record as a communicator and/or web editor
* Understanding of SEO and accessibility guidelines
* Experience from working with:
* CMS and CRM systems (we use Episerver and Microsoft Dynamics)
* Adobe Creative Suite
* Web analysis tools such as Piwik Pro, Google Analytics, Matomo or similar
* SEO tools such as Ahrefs or similar

**Meritorious:**

* Previous work in the solar business or within a technical field
* Previous work in a large, complex organization
* Experience from agile way of working
* Customer surveys – planning, effectuation and analysis of results
* Experience/interest in UX design
* Experience in working with email marketing
* Marketing automation knowledge

  

**Additional Information** **Our Offer**  

We offer a challenging and international work environment and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field. You will be working in interdisciplinary teams and you can always count on support from committed colleagues as ‘Ask and Share’ concept is essential for the way we work. We offer attractive employment conditions (smart working, flexible working hours and a good-work-life balance) and opportunities for personal and professional development. Click here for further information.

**Position**: Temporary 8 month employment

**Location**: Solna, Sweden. 40 % work place flexibility, 60 % office presence required.

title: Solutions Architect
description:
Do you have a passion for application architecture, APIs and agile methods and want to develop together with happy and engaged colleagues?
  
We are seeking a Solutions Architect with proven experience in supporting development teams within complex digital development and web projects. Our team leverages a modern technology stack to deliver exceptional and high-performing websites. The ideal candidate should have several years of experience as a solutions architect or developer, demonstrating a deep understanding of designing and implementing scalable solutions. They should be passionate about exploring innovative technologies, committed to following best practices, and dedicated to delivering exceptional results for our clients. Their expertise should include translating business requirements into technical solutions, optimizing system performance, and ensuring seamless integration across platforms. Excellent communication skills are essential, along with the ability to foster long-term relationships with clients while balancing the interests of both the clients and Dynamic Dog. Experience in e-commerce projects or other software development is considered an advantage.
  
  

**We expect you to be well versed in the following:**  

Experience of working with architect-related tasks.
  
Strategic advice, architecture and technical guidance based on the customer's needs.
  
Support development teams in the architecture and design of applications and software components.
  
Experience in e-commerce projects or other software development.
  
Worked with Optimizely or other CMS.
  
Experience of working with .NET Core, Kubernetes, GraphQL, Azure, SQL and Node.JS.
  
  

At DD Malmö you will primarily be part of a team working with one of our many clients, developing a new or existing web application either for informational or e-commerce purposes. Within the team you will be collaborating with tech leads, developers and UX designers at DD Malmö as well as our in-house team of web analysts. Teamwork is key here as we are a tight-knit group of people working together, sometimes in multiple projects. We expect you to be flexible and adaptable.
  
Languages
  
Swedish
  
English
  
  

What we offer
  
A fantastic workplace situated in a prime location in central Malmö.
  
You get to work with a bunch of really nice and exciting clients.
  
Generous wellness allowance.
  
Join an amazing team that knows how to have a good time.
  
An open-minded and fun work environment, all while delivering top-notch service to our clients!

title: UX-lead till samhällsviktigt uppdrag!
description:
Bli en del av framtidens digitala sjukvård - gör skillnad med Nexer!


Nexer har, efter vunnen upphandling med Inera, fått i uppdrag att utveckla och effektivisera den samhällsnyttiga digital tjänsten 1177.se. Nu söker vi en senior UX Lead som vill vara med på denna resa och som varje dag vill känna att du åstadkommer skillnad och bidrar till en samhällsviktig funktion.


**Om rollen:**


Vårt inhouse-team MyTeam arbetar med kundspecifika lösningar, där du är med i både nyutveckling och löpande underhåll. Det finns även stora möjligheter att vara med och förbättra funktionen för tjänsten. Teamet arbetar sedan tidigare för flertalet andra kunder men ska nu utvidga projektet för en av de viktigaste aktörerna inom digital sjukvård som 1177.se är.


Vi söker dig som är en äkta lagspelare och värdesätter samarbete. Teamet du ingår i består av utvecklare, testare, projektledare och arkitekter – alla med samma mål: att skapa långsiktiga, relevanta och värdeskapande lösningar för våra kunder.


MyTeam består idag av ca 70 medarbetare som löpande jobbar i olika projekt tillsammans, både stora och mellanstora. Vi erbjuder trygghet, kompetensutveckling och karriärmöjligheter. Möjligheten att arbeta som UX/UI Lead i detta team erbjuds i Göteborg, Alingsås och Lidköping.


**Dina arbetsuppgifter som UX/UI Lead kommer du att:**

* Designa, implementera och kommunicera UX-interaktion
* Leda och genomföra interaktions- och digital design i våra leveranser
* Engagera dig med intressenter och kunder för att säkerställa en högkvalitativ UX innan utveckling tar vid

Samarbeta med utvecklare för att designa och implementera komplexa produkter och tjänster  

* 

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**

* Senior erfarenhet i rollen som UX/UI-design
* Stark förståelse för både användarupplevelse och gränssnittsdesign
* Gedigen erfarenhet av att arbeta med Figma, Sketch eller Adobe Photoshop/Illustrator
* Haft tillgänglighet (WCAG) som en naturlig komponent i ditt arbete
* Gjort användarundersökningar och research
* Styrka inom prototyping och användartestning
* Förmåga att arbeta datadrivet, från research och koncept till testning och lansering
* Gjort designprocesser inom agila arbetsflöden
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i tekniska miljöer och viss förståelse för frontend-utveckling
* God kommunikationsförmåga

**Ansökan:**

Du ansöker genom att fylla i ansökningsformuläret nedan. Tyvärr kan vi inte ta emot ansökningar via e-post. Har du några frågor är du välkommen att kontakta vår rekryterare, Natalie Svensson, på Natalie.Svensson@nexergroup.com.

title: Product Owner
description:
**Role:**  

* Develop the product strategy and roadmap for rewards enhancements in collaboration with key stakeholders in Retail and Digital.
* Actively research customer needs and apply the resulting insights. Drive discovery.
* Deliver business outcomes by experimenting and continuously developing the product.
* Actively manage the product backlog, clearly expressing product backlog items with metrics and prioritizing based on business goals.
* Collaborate with Engineering, UX, Data and Analytics
* Align with other teams and manage dependencies to deliver product improvements
* Proven track record of having effectively created and owned product vision, product strategy and roadmaps.
* Experience being PO of backend products
* Good ability to influence, listen to and collaborate successfully with variety of stakeholders
* Being comfortable leading and empowering team members without formal management authority in a complex environment
* Bring in a data-driven approach to decision making, both in day-to-day management and in making strategic trade-offs
* Knowledge of the technology landscape in eCommerce, customer engagement, customer data. Ideally experience on Loyalty.
* Extensive experience with agile development practices (backlog refinement, sprint reviews, user stories
* Extensive experience managing products having a high level of dependencies to other products
* Good knowledge in how to define and measure success, for example how to create OKR or KPIs frameworks

  

**Please explain how you meet all the requirements** **when applying.**

**Location:** Malmö  

**Period**: 24-03-2025-29-05-2025

title: UI Scripter
description:
**UX/UI Scripter/programmer for Fellowship**


Do you love playing MOBAs, ARPGs or MMOs? Do you understand the intricacies of balancing understandable yet visually appealing UI for these types of games? If you are a skilled UX/UI Scripter and/or programmer and concepts like nameplates, damage meters, ability cooldowns and cast bars are familiar to you, we would love to hear from you!


This role is a 6 month initial contract, where you will be a part of implementing Fellowship's UI in Unreal Engine, with the possibility of extension & employment, on-site or hybrid in Stockholm, Sweden.

 **About Chief Rebel**  

  

Chief Rebel is a game development studio located in Stockholm, Sweden. We make stylized games with deeply involving mechanics. www.chiefrebel.com

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
**We are looking for an "UX/UI Designer" for a global company in Lund.**

**Start is in April, 9 month's limited contract to begin with, possibility of extension after that.**

 **Job Summary:**


The company is developing and delivering E2E connected solutions in the Food & Beverage industry, we are looking for a talented UX/UI Designer to help us develop the UX/UI for the Processing part of this business.

**What you will do:**

In this role, you will make an impact by

* Design intuitive products’ interfaces using wireframes and prototypes, aimed at maximizing the user experience with Automation & Digital products.
* Plan and conducts user research to capture customers’ needs, clarify product requirements with internal key stakeholders (e.g. Product Managers, Key account team), and translate them into user-friendly product interfaces
* Organize and execute concepts ideation sessions through dedicated workshops
* Work closely with the Development Team to provide product design indications and to ensure that products meet technical constraints
* Interact with UI Architects & Developers to define the interface architecture for our HMI and SCADA products
* Actively implementing the UX design in our HMI / SCADA solutions

**We believe you have:**


To be successful in this role, we believe that you have:

* Some years’ experience in working with User Experience design in the Digital / SW area, and/or in Industrial HMI / SCADA solutions
* Background in Human-Computer Interaction & Communication Sciences
* University Master degree education will be considered a plus
* Excellent command of English, both written and verbal, is a must.
* Understand business implications of product’s design
* Strong customer orientation and communication skills
* Knowledge of the technology applications in the Food & Beverage domain (as a plus)

**Technical competence:**

* Knowledge and proven skills in UX/UI design principles, user interface design, interaction design,
* Experience in wireframing and prototyping and related tools (Figma preferred choice)
* Experience with Design Thinking approach and User Research methodologies
* Experience with industrial HMI / SCADA products

**This is a full-time consultant position through Incluso in Lund.** **Start is in April, 9 month's limited contract to begin with, possibility of extension after that.**


Please submit your CV as soon as possible since we will review the applications on an on-going basis.


For more information about this role, please contact Kanika Singhal at kanika@incluso.se, recruiter at Incluso.

title: Fullstack Agile Engineer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Role:**  

* To develop and design robust and sustainable IT Solutions
* To act as a bridge between business and technical knowledge
* Be able to translate user stories into detailed solutions and integration design
* Collaborate with software developer peers, UX-designers, business experts and Product Owner
* To team up with IT Solution Architects and Solution Designers to collaborate on technical aspects
* To refine and review business requirements to ensure the most effective use of infrastructure and IT systems
* Your software development is according to best practice principles
* Contribute to the Agile team norms and coding standards, software design best practices, and architecture strategy
* Use, ensure and implement secure software development
* Be an ambassador for application solution best practices and application security
* Share your software development and solution design best practices with your peers within IT
**Essential requirements:**  

* More than 5 years’ experience as a developer
* The tech stack: Angular 15+, html, css, typescript, javaScript .net core, Microsoft Azure Cloud solutions
* Good knowledge Optimizely (EpiServer CMS) development
* MS DevOps, MS Visual studio, Git & Gitflow
* DAST och SAST tools
* Automatic unit and integration testing
* A deep interest in driving value-creating software development and innovation
* You speak Swedish and English fluently both oral and written
* 3 years of experience in Agile frameworks and agile software development
* Experience of Solution Design and IT architecture within the web area and cloud solution area is a plus
* API design and Management
* University degree in Information Technology, Engineering or other relevant educatio

  

**Last day to apply**: 21-03-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*
